title: What? Buying champion bug

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
https://gyazo.com/186864eb5a658cdf5b701fe61648727b
I have 6335 ip, yet I can't buy Illaio which is 6300 ip.

replies.body: I restarted the game, and it still says I don't have enough IP/RP.

Try switching over to the Legacy Client to make the purchase. This has been an issue for some players after the store outage last week. You can access the Legacy Client from the login screen:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this worked for you.

I've been having the same problem
I can buy any 4800 champs but i can buy 3150 and below (I have 5000 ip too)
